name: Balsamic Vinegar Potato Salad
author: PEREGRINTOOK
summary: If you enjoy marinated potato salads, this recipe is for you.  Definitely a delicious way to enjoy potato salad. I used roasted peppers from a jar.  Just as good as fresh.
ingredients: ½ cup diced roasted red peppers
1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
1 (10 ounce) can quartered artichoke hearts, drained
directions: Place potatoes in a saucepan with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil, then cook for 5 to 10 minutes, until tender
Drain, and transfer to a large bowl
Add the onion, red peppers, olives, and artichokes to the bowl with the potatoes
In a separate bowl, whisk together the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, oregano, basil, mustard powder and parsley
Pour over the vegetables, and stir to coat
Chill for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving
